edu.lehigh.cse.lol

Class Destination

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.lehigh.cse.lol.Actor
      • edu.lehigh.cse.lol.Destination

  • public class Destination
extends Actor
    Destinations are actors that the hero should try to reach. When a hero reaches a destination, the hero disappears, and the score updates.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class edu.lehigh.cse.lol.Actor

    • Constructor Detail

      • Destination

        protected Destination(float width,
                      float height,
                      java.lang.String imgName)
        Create a destination. This is an internal method, the game designer should not use this.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of this destination
        height - Height of this destination
        imgName - Name of the image to display

    • Method Detail

      • makeAsBox

        public static Destination makeAsBox(float x,
                                    float y,
                                    float width,
                                    float height,
                                    java.lang.String imgName)
        Make a destination that has an underlying rectangular shape.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the bottom left corner
        y - The Y coordinate of the bottom right corner
        width - The width of the destination
        height - The height of the destination
        imgName - The name of the image to display
        Returns:
        The destination, so that it can be modified further

      • makeAsPolygon

        public static Destination makeAsPolygon(float x,
                                        float y,
                                        float width,
                                        float height,
                                        java.lang.String imgName,
                                        float... verts)
        Draw a destination with an underlying polygon shape
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the bottom left corner
        y - Y coordinate of the bottom left corner
        width - Width of the obstacle
        height - Height of the obstacle
        imgName - Name of image file to use
        verts - Up to 16 coordinates representing the vertexes of this polygon, listed as x0,y0,x1,y1,x2,y2,...
        Returns:
        The destination, so that it can be further modified

      • setActivationScore

        public void setActivationScore(int score1,
                               int score2,
                               int score3,
                               int score4)
        Change the number of goodies that must be collected before the destination accepts any heroes (the default is 0,0,0,0)
        Parameters:
        score1 - The number of type-1 goodies that must be collected.
        score2 - The number of type-2 goodies that must be collected.
        score3 - The number of type-3 goodies that must be collected.
        score4 - The number of type-4 goodies that must be collected.

      • setHeroCount

        Change the number of heroes that can be accepted by this destination (the default is 1)
        Parameters:
        heroes - The number of heroes that can be accepted
